sections.body: This Act may be called the Explosives Act, 1884; and it extends to the whole of Pakistan.
This Act shall come into force on such day as the Federal Government, by notification in the official Gazette, appoints.
This section has been repealed.
Definitions of terms used in the Act, including 'explosives', 'illegal activities', 'manufacture', and others.

sections.section_title: Power to make rules as to licensing of the manufacture, possession, use, sale, transport and importation of explosives
sections.body: The Federal Government may make rules to regulate or prohibit the manufacture, possession, use, sale, transport, import and export of explosives.

sections.section_title: Offences of minor and major violations
sections.body: Details regarding penalties for minor and major violations by licensees.
Procedures for the trial of offences under this Act.

sections.section_title: Power of the Federal Government to prohibit the manufacture, possession, use, sale, transport, import or export of specially dangerous explosives
sections.body: The Federal Government has the authority to prohibit certain activities related to specially dangerous explosives.

sections.section_title: Prohibition of manufacture, possession, sale or use, transport, import and export of explosives by young persons and certain other persons
sections.body: Restrictions on young persons and certain others regarding explosives.
Details regarding jurisdiction over offences under this Act.

sections.section_title: Power to make rules conferring powers of inspection, search, seizure, detention and removal
sections.body: The Federal Government may make rules regarding inspection and enforcement.
Requirements for notifying accidents involving explosives.
Procedures for inquiring into accidents.
Special procedures for serious accidents.
Liability of companies for offences under this Act.
Provisions for assistance from organizations.
Conditions under which explosives may be forfeited.
Provisions regarding distress situations involving aircraft or vessels.
Liability for abetment and attempts to commit offences.

sections.section_title: Power to arrest without warrant persons committing dangerous offences
sections.body: Authority to arrest individuals committing dangerous offences.
Provisions for exemptions under this Act.
Provisions regarding the Arms Act.

sections.section_title: Saving as to liability under other law
sections.body: Clarifications regarding liabilities under other laws.

sections.section_title: Extension of definition of 'explosive' to other explosive substances
sections.body: Broadening the definition of explosives.

sections.section_title: Procedure for making publication and confirmation of rules
sections.body: Procedures for the publication and confirmation of rules.
Regulations regarding the air transportation of explosives.
Provisions for addressing difficulties in the implementation of this Act.
